column2: great old school cocktails and even better food.  Not the easiest place in town to get in
column3: but worth the wait and fight for reservations.  I've actually had luck walking in late and getting a table or snagging a spot at the bar (reservations seem to be easing a little as well
column4: as I was able to book a table on a Friday night with little notice
column5: something that was unheard of a few months prior).
